column1: Little Goat Diner////Came back here for the 3rd time for a quick birthday dinner. We decided to try out their new savory asian pancakes. First
column2: the scallion pancake was just ok
column3: nothing too exciting. It's very similar to the pork belly pancake they had back then
column4: but just without the pork belly. It was just sour veggies on top of a pancake. I think they could've done better with this menu.
